definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: Now peace-keeping has turned into peace-enforcement.
sentences.chinese: 現在維護和平已經變成了強制和平。

sentences.english: To maintain peace is the shared mission of the international community.
sentences.chinese: 維護和平是國際社會的共同使命。

sentences.english: Therefore, to safeguard peace and promote development requires common efforts by the international community.
sentences.chinese: 維護和平，促進發展，需要國際社會的共同努力。

sentences.english: People are always a strong force for peace.
sentences.chinese: 人民始終是維護和平的強大力量。

sentences.english: Their main role is as a peace-keeper.
sentences.chinese: 它的主要作用是維護和平。

sentences.english: Qin said the effect of its aid was to safeguard peace and development momentum.
sentences.chinese: 秦剛稱，對太平洋島國提供援助意在維護和平和發展。

sentences.english: In a world facing complex international situation, we should all work together to uphold peace and stability.
sentences.chinese: 面對複雜的國際局勢，我們主張要堅定維護和平穩定。
